description: Promotion of a wider application of international human rights standards in the administration of justice in Belarus

subproject.corporate outcome: National institutions are strengthened to better apply international human rights standards, effectively combat illicit drugs and human trafficking
subproject.description:
The administration of justice in Belarus is enhanced by:
1.Improving the access of justice sector professionals to information on international human rights standards and case-law;  2. Exposing the justice sector professionals to the best international practices; 3. Developing recommendations on further improvement of the national legislation and its implementation; 4.	Promoting better understanding of the role of the judiciary system in a democratic law-abiding state by the general public.
subproject.title: HUMAN RIGHTS AND JUSTICE

subproject.corporate outcome: National institutions are strengthened to better apply international human rights standards, effectively combat illicit drugs and human trafficking
subproject.title: HR EDUCAT IN SCHOOLS PRINTING
